  • Constructor Details

    • JsonRpcProxyConfiguration

      @ConfigurationInject public JsonRpcProxyConfiguration​(@Bindable(defaultValue="org.bitcoin.production") String networkId, URI uri, String username, String password, boolean useZmq, List<String> allowList)
      Injectable constructor
      Parameters:
      networkId - A valid bitcoinj network id, see NetworkParameters.getId()
      uri - URI to server including port number
      username - JSON-RPC username
      password - JSON-RPC password
      allowList - A list of allowed method names
